notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by Instituto de Salud Carlos III, Fondo de Investigación Sanitaria (FIS) PI16/00103, PI17/00624 and CP14/00016 cofinanced by FEDER. EB is a research fellow from ISCIII-FIS (CP14/00016). EGV, MP, LG are research fellows from Generalitat de Catalunya AGAUR. RB is a research fellow from PERIS, Generalitat de Catalunya (PERIS SLT002/16/00059). IE is a research fellow from la Caixa Bank Foundation (LCF/BQ/IN18/11660017) cofunded by the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under the Marie Sklodowska-Curie grant agreement No. 713673.
